Description Marcus Meissner 2014-04-10 14:02:46 UTC 
/etc/apparmor.d/usr.lib.apache2.mpm-prefork.apache2 does

  / rw,
  /** mrwlkix,


so basically ... every process can do everything.

Correct me if I am wrong, but this profile is then not necessary.
Comment 1 Marcus Meissner 2014-04-10 14:04:11 UTC 
also the name is wrong, prefork would be in /usr/sbin/httpd2-prefork  at SUSE :/
